data.name: Chronescher
data.detailed_description:
Ascend the roofs of the city and journey to the top of the highest tower, where you may even discover something about yourself.

Chronescher is a challanging isometric puzzle game. Set in an escherpunk world consisting of six unique biomes. It requires you to learn time- space- and mindbending mechanics in order to puzzle your way forward. As you progress further you will untangle who you are playing and what happend to them.



Master Time and Space: Learn to place portals and return to them at a whim. Place a timeanchor in order to take a snapshot of the level and restore the saved state at a later point - without moving yourself. Change your perspective in order to unveil new paths and hidden passages. The most difficult puzzles will require you to combine all these abilities and reach places that seem almost impossible to get to.

Chronescher is a challanging isometric puzzle game. Set in an escherpunk world consisting of six unique biomes. Change your perspective in order to unveil new paths and hidden passages. data.short_description: Chronescher is a challenging turn-based puzzle game in Escher-esque spaces. Use impossible geometries, teleportation and environmental snapshots to navigate your mind and uncover your lost memories.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 2000, GeForce 8800 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, or CentOS 7
  • Processor: 64 bit Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable graphics card
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, CentOS 7 or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: Gnome 3 desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system
